relproducts.title: Rimini Coffee - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Think luxurious, rich, creamy cappuccino, and you've got the feel of the rimini in coffee. This is the perfect neutral shade - soft enough to fit well amongst other, richer shades, yet distinct enough to work as a colour all by itself. Nestle amongst rich browns, pale creams, and vintage golds to really make the most of this subtle hue, which makes a beautiful, sophisticated accent for a bedroom or living room window.

relproducts.title: Rimini Chocolate - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: You'll be left craving the rich luxury of dark cocoa when you see the rimini in chocolate. Think cosy nights in by a warm fire, a great movie, and the family gathered round; this is the kind of atmosphere the chocolate brings to mind. Pair up with creams, golds, and beiges for a classic yet contemporary finish. This is the perfect shade for a tranquil living room; a snug, homely bedroom; or a warm, swish home office.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mocha Brown Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm mocha brown is a soft milk coffee shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm mocha brown roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. relproducts.description: Stirlochocolate brown plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.
